function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low COVID-19 knowledge among respondents","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission due to lack of awareness","Mitigation":"Provide targeted education and awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Digital platforms, social media, educational apps","People":"Respondents, general public","Owner":"Health authorities, government, community organizations"},{"Description":"High risk perception of severity of COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Panic, irrational behavior, and overburdening of healthcare system","Mitigation":"Provide accurate information and reassurance, mental health support","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, telemedicine, mental health apps","People":"Respondents, general public","Owner":"Health authorities, government, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Low perception of susceptibility to COVID-19","Impact":"Reduced adherence to preventive measures and safety protocols","Mitigation":"Provide personalized risk communication and targeted messaging","Technologies":"Data analytics, AI algorithms, targeted communication platforms","People":"Respondents, general public","Owner":"Health authorities, government, communication agencies"}]}
